content: think pink lap blanket crochet pattern please add this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites this pattern is a written pattern and photo tutorial and a brand new video ***free pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2019/10/the-think-pink-lap-blanket-crochet html ***video link *** https //youtu be/akfucjysgjm skill easy materials crochet hook h / 5 00 mm 10 oz yarn light 3 i used premier dk colors tiara 2 balls 766 yds / 10 oz yarn needle stitches chain chain double_crochet double_crochet skip space space space stitch st cross stitch crst explained in the pattern foundation double_crochet fdc size 26 w x 36 l inches repeat - multiples of 2 + 6 3 double_crochet = 1 inch 3 row = 2 inch please do not copy or redistribute this pattern
